Verses: 1 eththiyoppiyaa Dhesaththu Sthreeyai Mose Vivaagampanniyirundhapadiyinaal, Miriyaamum Aaronum Avan Vivaagampannina Eththiyoppiyaa Dhesaththu Sthreeyinimiththam Avanukku Virodhamaaip Pesi:
2 karththar Moseyaik Kondumaaththiram Pesinaaro, Engalaikkondum Avar Pesinadhillaiyo Endraargal. Karththar Adhaik Kettaar.
3 moseyaanavan Boomiyilulla Sagala Manidharilum Migundha Saandhagunamullavanaayirundhaan.
4 sadudhiyile Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Miriyaamaiyum Nokki: Neengal Moondruperum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkup Purappattuvaarungal Endraar; Moondruperum Ponaargal.
5 karththar Megaththoonil Irangi, Koodaaravaasalile Nindru, Aaronaiyum Miriyaamaiyum Kooppittaar; Avargal Iruvarum Ponaargal.
6 appozhudhu Avar: En Vaarththaigalaik Kelungal; Ungalukkulle Oruvan Theerkkadharisiyaayirundhaal, Karththaraagiya Naan Dharisanaththil Ennai Avanukku Velippaduththi, Soppanaththil Avanode Pesuven.
7 en Dhaasanaagiya Moseyo Appadippattavan Alla, En Veettil Engum Avan Unmaiyullavan.

8 naan Avanudan Maraiporulaaga Alla, Mugamugamaagavum Praththiyatchamaagavum Pesugiren; Avan Karththarin Saayalaik Kaangiraan; Ippadiyirukka, Neengal En Dhaasanaagiya Mosekku Virodhamaaip Pesa, Ungalukkup Bayamillaamarponadhenna Endraar.
9 karththarudaiya Kobam Avargalmel Moondadhu; Avar Poivittaar.
10 megam Koodaaraththai Vittu Neengippoyitru; Miriyaam Uraindha Mazhaiyin Venmaipondra Kushtarogiyaanaal; Aaron Miriyaamaip Paarththapodhu, Aval Kushtarogiyaayirukkak Kandaan.
11 appozhudhu Aaron Moseyai Nokki: Aa, En Aandavane, Naangal Buththiyeenamaai Seydha Indhap Paavaththai Engalmel Sumaththaadhirum.
12 than Thaayin Garppaththil Paadhi Maamsam Azhugi Seththuvizhundha Pillaiyaippola Aval Aagaadhiruppaalaaga Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Mose Karththarai Nokki: En Dhevane, Avalaik Gunamaakkum Endru Kenjinaan.

14 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Aval Thagappan Aval Mugaththile Kaarith Thuppinadhundaanaal, Aval Ezhunaal Vetkappadavendaamo, Adhupolave Aval Ezhunaal Paalayaththukkup Purambe Vilakkappattirundhu, Pinbu Serththukkollappadakkadaval Endraar.
15 appadiye Miriyaam Ezhunaal Paalayaththukkup Purambe Vilakkappattirundhaal; Miriyaam Serththukkollappadumattum Janangal Prayaanampannaadhirundhaargal.
16 pinbu, Janangal Aasaroththilirundhu Purappattu, Baaraan Vanaandharaththile Paalayamiranginaargal.
